code: @Override public void onStartup(Set<Class<?>> classes, ServletContext servletContext) throws ServletException {     try {         for (ServletContextInitializer initializer : this.initializers) {             initializer.onStartup(servletContext).         }     } catch (Exception ex) {         this.startUpException = ex.         // deal with it in the main thread, but log for information here.         if (logger.isErrorEnabled()) {             logger.error("Error starting Tomcat context. Exception: " + ex.getClass().getName() + ". Message: " + ex.getMessage()).         }     } }
